title: egyptian slab?
content:
hello peoples,

i am looking for a slab serif version of ’egyptian’, famously used in the guardian, does anyone know whether it is available to the general public or whether it was drawn just for them?

 [‹ Replacing Apex New - Cyrillic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905133219/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18720 "Go to previous forum topic") [TYPE BATTLE: Week 8 (13 March) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905133219/http:/www.typophile.com/battle08 "Go to next forum topic")
author: leonidas

comments.content:
It’s an exclusive, more info here:  
 [http://www.orangeitalic.com/guardian.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905133219/http:/www.orangeitalic.com/guardian.shtml "http://www.orangeitalic.com/guardian.shtml")
If you can wait... it will be available in 2008 (didn’t mean to rhyme there...) It’s a great typeface.
i’ll speak to the client and see if they’re up for it... thanks though guys.
